data.title: Jeffrey Dean Morgan Shops With Fans For Make A Wish
data.meta_description: Here is just one more reason why we love JDM.
data.text:
Here is just one more reason why we love JDM.

Jeffrey Dean Morgan is one of Hollywood's biggest stars.

Jeffrey Dean Morgan has had some notable television appearances on hit shows like Supernatural and Grey's Anatomy. Morgan has also appeared in major films like Watchmen, The Losers, The Possession, and Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, where he played Thomas Wayne, Batman's father. Of course, he may be remembered forever as playing Negan the bat-wielding psycho in The Walking Dead. He was spotted a few months ago working on a project outside of a Walmart store in Kingston.

Read More: Jeffrey Dean Morgan Spotted at Hudson Valley Walmart

Jeffrey Dean Morgan shopping in Rhinebeck, New York

JDM might be a big star in Hollywood and all over the world but he is one of the Hudson Valley's favorite local celebrities. Jeffrey Dean Morgan is one of the more popular stars in the Hudson Valley region of New York. Not just because of his amazing work but because he and his wife, Hilarie Burton Morgan live and help the community.

One lucky fan along with their family got to spend the day with JDM in Rhinebeck.

Megabrain Comics in Rhinebeck posted a picture of Jeffrey Dean Morgan and some fans visiting their store. At first glance, it seemed like a surprise and random drop-in by the star of The Walking Dead. The visit had a very special reason behind it.

Jeffrey Dean Morgan shared the experience on his Instagram page.
